yacl3.config.bbm.title: Better Boat Movement
yacl3.config.bbm.category.general.root.o: The number of blocks you are going to be boosted when triggering a boost.
The ticks the game waits before kicking you out of a boat after the player lost control.
Sets the preferences under which states the boat should be boosted.
Defines the blocks the boat has to lie on to be able to be boosted. If the list is empty, there is no restriction.
Defines the blocks the boat has to collide with to be able to be boosted. If the list is empty, there is no restriction.
Toggles, whether a boat should only be boosted when carrying a player.

Changes the detection range of a collision. Increasing this will boost a boat x blocks before actually touching the block it approaches.
*You may encounter weird behavior when changing this value to big numbers.*
yacl3.config.bbm.category.keybind.root.o: Toggles, whether a player should be able to jump with a boat via a keybind.
Specifies the multiplier that will be applied to the jump height when a player uses the keybind to jump.
Only jump by keybind on ground or water

Decides whether you are allowed to jump midair by keybind or not.
CAUTION: This option combined with a high keybind jump multiplier will result in extreme boosts as the boat will be boosted every tick you hold the keybind.
